main event: A commercial airline pilot reported seeing an unidentified object trailing green and blue flames between Medford, Oregon and Mt. Shasta, California on December 30, 1947.
interesting points: The pilot and co-pilot observed the object for about 2 seconds while flying at an altitude of 13,000 feet,The object was described as descending vertically at a very high rate of speed,The pilots noted that the object seemed to slow down slightly as it approached the ground,The sighting occurred during an administrative flight from Great Falls, Montana to Fairfield-Suisun Air Force Base,The objectâ€™s flames were intensely bright and appeared at a position of 2:30 o'clock in relation to the airplane.
location: Between Medford, Oregon and Mt. Shasta, California
